settings.title: We collect the following types of information about you:
We collect the above information when you provide it to us or when you use or visit our Platform. We may also receive information about you from other sources, including:
settings.answer: our personnel, agents, advisors, consultants, and contractors based in Singapore in connection with our operations or services, for example our staff engaged in the fulfilment of your order, processing of your payment, and provision of support services;
